summary: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.
cast: Mike Myers|Eddie Murphy|Cameron Diaz|John Lithgow|Vincent Cassel|Peter Dennis|Clive Pearse|Jim Cummings|Bobby Block|Chris Miller|Cody Cameron|Kathleen Freeman|Michael Galasso|Christopher Knights|Simon J. Hecker|Richard Steven Horvitz|Phillip Ingram|Hope Levy|Patrick Pinney|Phil Proctor|Hal Smith|Frank Welker
title: Shrek
